title: Evidence-Based Learning Through Historical Map-Based Instruction: Applying Mobile Microlearning for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geography knowledge and foundational understanding of history education
context.additional_context: Evidence-based learning activities utilizing GIS-based applications in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically input 11th-century historical map symbols into a GIS database after analysis.
Learners can construct shared knowledge structures by demonstrating political literacy competencies based on evidence.
Learners can interpret and explain historical spatial information using microlearning content in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
